lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I believe that wealthier people and nations should do all they can to help those struggling out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Although now I am retired, I spent many years teaching young people how to write better and read with more understanding. I also introduced them to new ideas about other peoples and cultures.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help other people out.
lender.occupational_info: I fit people for eyeglasses and have done this for years!

lender.name: Jakub
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves equality and a chance towards freedom.
lender.occupational_info: We are a working class couple in Utah, Jakub cooks for recovering addicts and Susanna works with animals.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: justice demands it.
lender.occupational_info: I determine if the people who have had their drivers license taken away because they were drinking alcohol and driving should be allowed to drive again.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: others need help to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I train people to draw blood in a hospital.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: I received a loan when life was difficult which allowed me to build a business which was very sucessful and gave me an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I manage things profitably.

lender.name: Cindie
lender.loan_because: My daughter, who is a member, gave me a gift certificate for Mother's Day, What a wonderful way to regift.

lender.name: Kay
lender.occupational_info: Retired as an executive administrator for state fish and wildlife agency.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: my daughter gave me a Kiva gift certificate and I've been loaning ever since.

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference in the lives of others! This is a perfect opportunity to be that person who can provide the much needed boost for a great idea or concept to soar!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of dedicated consultants whose primary clients are Small Business users of Rogers Business products.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: I have two very difficult daughters and don't even ask me about my son

lender.name: JiminTexas
lender.loan_because:
I want to help those who work hard to help themselves and others.
Check out my link below and help me raise money for the Foundation Beyond Belief - an awesome secular charity.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to change the status of women, especially in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I teach a life-management class to teen-aged girls.

lender.name: Rosamond
lender.loan_because: You only get one shot.
lender.occupational_info: Health, nutrition knowledge, food access, education, obesity prevention.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I'd really like this idea.

lender.name: Diego
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva's mission
lender.occupational_info: On-Line Media Management

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Originally from Connecticut, USA, I now live in Argentina and have seen firsthand the abject poverty that exists in much of South America.

lender.name: Touchstones
lender.loan_because: We are a group of 10 friends who wish to support women around the world who are working to better their lives and support their families through business enterprises.
lender.occupational_info: Most of us work in education as teachers, nurses and counselors, and administrators.

lender.name: John Poltrack
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is a good thing. I've received help and I want to return in kind.
lender.occupational_info: I test software as a means of income, but my real passions are Music, Gardening and Photography.

lender.name: Sven
lender.loan_because:
A few years after my grandfather immigrated to the States, his employer loaned him the money to start his own business and gave him the right advice/criticism to flourish.
What worked then, works now.

lender.name: Sung
lender.loan_because: My family has been incredibly blessed in having our relatives to help build our donut business, which has helped paid for my college and medical school tuition. I feel it is my responsibility to share the blessing.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: Our seventh grade advisory group is donating our allocation of advisory funds to Kiva. We hope, through Kiva, that this money will be put to good use.

lender.name: Marley
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy to help in any way i can
lender.occupational_info: i watch i listen i learn i grow

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Keithamy!
lender.loan_because: We love Microfinance Entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: FUN!

lender.name: Penn
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others in some way. I know if you give to those in need our grand universe pays you back :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer & online entrepreneur.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe people should have a hand up - not a hand out. I want to be there to help with the hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses. I am also a Mother of 2 beautiful children.

lender.name: JAMES
lender.loan_because: The impact that is made is completely life changing for the recipient who simply needs very modest help. If you have not been to a 3W Country you won't understand the profound impact so little brings. To dramatically change their lives and those around them is the most satisfying emotion I have ever felt . It's not a handout. I heard this once and never forgot it.... "Give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. Teach a man how to fish, you feed him for a lifetime".
lender.occupational_info: I am the General Manager responsible for day to day oversight for Departments that involve Sales,Training, Supply Chain Mgt., Distribution, Delivery, Installation, and Customer Satisfaction.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to see others able to achieve the things they want to. I want to loan to others to help them attain these dreams, just like I have loaned money from others to get me through school in order to achieve mine!
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying at Penn-State University to become an art educator!

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance gives people choices, and the chance to improve their lives in small and lovely ways. Every little bit makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info:
Shared stories as a Kiva Fellow in Cagayan de Oro, Philippines - love to KF9 and my host MFI, Hagdan sa Pag-uswag Foundation, Inc.!
Learn more about HSPFI: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=128
Join HSPFI's lending team! http://www.kiva.org/team/hspfi
Lend to a HSPFI borrower! Check out all of HSPFI's fundraising loans here: http://www.kiva.org/app.php?page=businesses&partner_id=128&status=fundRaising&sortBy=New+to+Old

lender.name: Tien
lender.loan_because: I want to open small fashion clothes shop.
lender.occupational_info: I'm living in Nha Trang city, a medium city of Viet Nam. In my city the people almost is youth. They are business women, students... And I think they need change every month for their fashion clothes. If I have $ 500 I will go to Hochiminh City buy fashion clothes by cheap prices ex: I buy 1 skrit 70 000 VND at Hochiminh City after that I come back my city I will hanger it in my shop nearly crow street, I will sell this one over 120 000 VND easy. But now I have only $ 500 so that I need loan $ 500 more for my project. Thank you so much for your support

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I have a great life and it is my responsibility to give back.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it is the most economically-sound way to improve the world through charitable works; it treats the cause of poverty, not the effects.
lender.occupational_info: I research international economic policy: how do people think about money?; how do governments justify spending money on things that provide no monetary return?; why do cultures think differently about money?

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Prime mover as Aristotle would say.
lender.occupational_info: Take care of other peoples animals with lots of love.

lender.name: Prescott Kiva Group
lender.loan_because: We see micro-finance as the best path of action for combating poverty in the developing world, and promoting a sense of community and work ethic which preserves the local culture of the area.

lender.name: The West - Monahan girls
lender.loan_because: it teaches our children that giving a little can go a LONG way one world = one love
lender.occupational_info: I am a waitress and my partner is a nurse.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because:
I do it because I'm a Christian.
Its an easy way to help people who need resources to become independent and productive citizens of our world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with a lot of needs.

lender.name: S. Andrew Owens
lender.loan_because: My spirit tells me to. My heart tells me to. My mind tells me to. How can I not?
lender.occupational_info: I am a spiritual aspirant who is a devotee and disciple of Sri Sri Mata Amritanandamayi Devi (Amma) and am trying to live Her message of Love & Service.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I like to give someone a chance to be able to support themselfs & their family and the concept of kiva is a great way to do so
lender.occupational_info: I am a house wife, I keep my self fit , I look after the house garden and dogs.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I believe empowering indiviudals in poverty striken countries is the first step to a more peaceful and sustainable world!!!
lender.occupational_info: Full time student in Boston

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: IT should be used to improve the quality of life in developing countries. So let's change the world one entrepreneur at a time!

lender.name: Racquel Ellen Borjal
lender.loan_because: i'm blessed... to be a blessing...

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I think micro loans work. I made a loan to some people in Peru because I spent 5 weeks there and feel an attachment.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies sell their products.

lender.name: MayersDesign
lender.loan_because: I started my own business, but I needed some capital to do it. Everyone needs a head start.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build websites for mainly English clients.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I am happy to do it.
lender.occupational_info: helping people with anxiety and stress to be more calm and happy

lender.name: Abdul Basit
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: mintbeck
lender.loan_because: I believe the most important thing in this world is our relationships with others. I loan because someone wants to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I monitor bank operations. I look for money laundering activities, make sure we are operating within US regulation, and manage the IT help desk.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the concept of Kiva- I love the idea of being able to provide financial help to hard working families around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Perform financial analysis for a design solutions software company in San Rafael, CA.

lender.name: Camilla
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment, and that entrepreneurship at all levels can create better living conditions.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations create webpages, coordinate events, write applications and assist in project administration.

lender.occupational_info: I tutor students in mathematics.

lender.name: may
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate for Mother's Day. I can't think of a better gift than to pick a mother with children who needs a little help and donate the gift for them to use to make things better for their family.
lender.occupational_info: Catalog Order Processing/Customer Service/ Specialist/Supervisor.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to become helpful and important members of their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families that are struggling with poverty, drug/alcohol addiction, abuse and domestic violence. I work with the families so that the children will remain in a safe and supportive environment (hopefully) with their own family members.

lender.name: howard
lender.loan_because: help others around the world reach their dreams
lender.occupational_info: helping independent business compete against bigger national companies

lender.name: Alix Andrea
lender.loan_because: It's a responsibility of all people, to realize what they have and to give because of it.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.occupational_info: I am the conductor of the show Wicked here in california.

lender.name: Mark & Stef
lender.loan_because: Stef's parents have had success with this organization and we try to only lend to organizations where a majority of the money goes to benefit the charity, not those running it.
lender.occupational_info: Mark works as a systems adminsitrator at a website hosting company (making sure websites are still being broadcast and fixing problems when they aren't) and Stef works as a geologist for a major oil company (she tries to understand the rocks that may contain the next big find).

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: It is crucial that everyone participates when they can. Kiva makes worldwide participation in improving lives possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work to put solar panels on schools and to provide awareness, education and empowerment to the students and their community.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: My friends and community helped me to realize how far a small loan can go and the impact it can have on the world as it grows. And since it's a loan, it's not the same as charity. as my wise friend once said, "it's the whole idea of giving a man a fish to eat, or teaching him how to fish."

lender.name: susanne
lender.loan_because: there is need.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: it's important to help out your community and where you're from.
lender.occupational_info: I teach sailing and my other job is hard to explain. I work for a company that designs and produces parts for wireless communication.

lender.name: Fred and Monica
lender.loan_because: We wish to make a difference in the lives of others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Monica and Fred are professionals in the field of educational fitness, wellness and coaching. Fred is a retired Athletic Director. Monica teaches at the college level.

lender.name: Mira
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has an obligation to create a better world. I think people should build communities of support to reach their hands across borders, and this is my small contribution trying to help.

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: I am a succesful entrepreneur and I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and the premise that we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I own a fresh pasta company that makes and sells fresh pasta, ravioli, sauces and specialty foods.

lender.name: Elizabeth Breedlove
lender.loan_because: It's personal, it's effective, it's a privilege and an obligation to help our fellow sisters who deserve a fair chance to start their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a research lab that looks for new anti-cancer therapies using gene signatures, so people can get the best treatment for their disease. I also volunteer for Democrats Abroad Spain, making sure all Americans living here can vote for US President.

lender.name: todaymoser
lender.loan_because: i wanna support people, who need it

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: A little help in people's lives can change their circumstances for the better.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves, which instills a sense of purpose, pride and dignity, which is really invaluable
lender.occupational_info: Project manager for an engineering team

lender.name: Jacki
lender.loan_because: Its my way of giving back since I've been so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I like to draw and paint with watercolor

lender.name: Agnes Chu
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to pursue happiness.

lender.name: Cabrillo College
lender.loan_because: WE believe in the possibility for change. Poverty can be over come and KIVA is a great way to join the efforts and join the community that is reaching out to people all over the world. WE are excited to be here, let's get started and work together. We are looking forward to seeing the power of community through KIVA! In the words of Ben Harper we have to believe that,"[we] can change the world, make it a better place, make it a kinder place, make peace on earth, with [our] own two hands..."
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of college students who have been inspired by the positive change that KIVA is committed to. Poverty can be overcome and it begins with people standing up and taking action against it. So we are here to join in the efforts and are very excited and thankful for the opportunity to be a part of something big, positive, caring and effective at creating sustainable change. Let's do it!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to see Dr. Mohammad Yunus speak in Canada. I want to support micro-credit and social business because I believe in the power of people to transform their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate of International Development Studies and am pursuing post-graduate studies in Public Relations.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because:
I believe with Andre Brink (A Dry White Season) "There are only two kinds of madness one must guard against: One is the belief that we can do everything. The other is the belief that we can do nothing."
Or, as a proverb quoted by Dambisa Moyo in her book, "Dead Aid" puts it: "The best time to plant a tree is 20 years ago. The second best time is now."
lender.occupational_info: I teach biology and related subjects to high school students. I also travel to Zambia, every other year, with students from my school. We work with partner schools in Lusaka, mostly on computer skills training.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I am interested in how the lessons I've learned in the US venture capital industry can be applied to micro-finance initiatives to help solve social problems in developing AND developed countries
lender.occupational_info: I invest in entrepreneurs with interesting business ideas, usually with a new or different application of technology. I work with them after the investment to help grow their businesses.

lender.name: Amy Masten
lender.loan_because: As a World Geography teacher, I teach my students about micro-lending and micro-entrepreneurs. I let the students choose who receives our loan so they can see first-hand how a small amount of money can make a big difference in someone else's life!

lender.name: Alisha
lender.loan_because: Whenever there is suffering in the world, I too suffer.
lender.occupational_info: I am unemployed and am looking for work that benefits communities rather than adds to the problems. For example, I will not work for a fast food restaurant because it promotes gluttony, laziness, and health problems. I will work for a bookstore because it promotes ideas, knowledge and good will. These types of jobs are hard to come by in my country.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public school library in the United States. The school has 1550 students in grades 10-12. I help students select books, research, and evaluate resources. I also work with teachers to teach classes.

lender.name: Kamil
lender.loan_because: I want to make this world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: Work for an internet company which helps small businesses market themselves by allowing them to create marketing materials (e.g. business cards, flyers, etc.) which don't cost much and are professional looking

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I try to learn a lot of things, in hope that someday I will be able to use those things to create something useful to society.

lender.name: paula
lender.loan_because: i believe everyone deserves a chance to make their lives better. The stories warm my heart. I have been blessed and wish to help in any small way I can.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: God calls me to live a life of love and service for others and I'm VERY excited about that kind of life!!
lender.occupational_info: I work to make sure donors to my organization are recognized for their support, that their philanthropic intent is met, and that they stay connected to the cause they love.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because:
I can. I have been blessed with a charmed life: 2 wonderful daughters, an amazing wife, a roof over our head, a job that is consistent, faith that is deep, and people around me that could also help if I need it.
So, with all of this, it should be easy to give back.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and adults how to play the piano.

lender.name: May
lender.loan_because: this is a gift from my boss. Through him, I know this organization. Giving is receiving. This gift is special and you are special too, boss!

lender.name: Ann
lender.occupational_info: Teaching French and English Rocky Mount, NC USA

lender.name: Reggie
lender.loan_because:
I want to help, and I know what it's like to need help.
Luke 6:31 Do to others as you would have them do to you.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed software engineer

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: This is not just an anonymous gift to an unknown person. It's chance for me to foster a connection to another person. To respect their livelihood and culture by providing the support that they ask for not what we think they need.
lender.occupational_info: I draw and make books.

lender.name: Xandi and Jacob
lender.occupational_info: Our team consists of family and friends who want to help us celebrate our wedding in a meaningful manner.

lender.name: SeattleCzar
lender.loan_because: With a limited income, this is my opportunity to make a difference, worldwide.

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: of my dad who is gone and my daughter who is still here and will be long after...
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy work which allows me to help support my family and to have some interesting life experiences.

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to get a fair loan and fairly repay it.
lender.occupational_info: I look at how things work in daily life and find better ways of doing them; more efficient ways which in turn saves money for someone else usually.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: we've been given all we need and more, and we want to help out others with whatever we can.

lender.name: Julie
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit several magazines and websites about mental health.

lender.name: suresh Gandhari
lender.loan_because: i want to do business of musical instrument .which my ans ester had done . i want to preserve my cultural musical instrument.
lender.occupational_info:
The Gandharba are Nepal‚Äôs only traditional musician caste. According to myth, the original Gandharba descended from the heavens to spread local news, music and songs from community to community. In Hindu mythology the Gandharba were once the winged musicians of the Gods. Unfortunately, the Gandharbas belong to a caste that belongs to the "dalit" or ‚Äúuntouchables‚Äù- a title given to those born into a role that once left them within the socially and economically downtrodden groups of Nepal. Long before Television and the Radio, they travelled from place to place, playing their lively music and spreading news, making them messengers of the nation. Our ancestors would sing tales with themes ranging from battles and stories of long ago to local gossip, in exchange for a small amount of money or food. We played a significant role in spreading and preserving Nepali culture and folklore. During the unification of Nepal, King Prithivi Narayan Shah utilized the Gandharba people throughout the country to sing in favor of a united kingdom. Gandharbas further played a diplomatic and tactical role in the formation of Nepal as a united kingdom, by facilitating the transfer of information from one region to another, encouraging cooperation between the different districts that were finally uniting. Throughout Nepali History this has been the case, up until the present day, such as seen in the role played by the Gandharbas in the JANA ANDOLAN of 2006/2007.
The recent advances in modern media communication have displaced our traditional roles. Regular employment as a traditional Nepali folk musician is difficult to both find and secure, despite the fact that our music is a cultural treasure. We have little or no land and, due to poverty, many of us have not received an education beyond primary school. In an effort to find musical employment many Gandharbas have migrated to the main tourist areas of Nepal, hoping to sell an occasional Sarangi as a means of inconsistent income. We have our own culture, rituals, traditions and lifestyle, which we strive with the meager funds raised from sale of our musical instruments, or the occasional performances, to maintain in a modern, developing, ever more expensive world.
Relying so heavily on tourism as a source of income, most of the Gandharba living and working in the cities are left homeless and food-less during off-peak tourist seasons. Improved shelter, food, clothing, jobs, health and education are urgently required for this group of people to survive, as well as maintain their identity in this busy world. Still we wander form place to place, trying to make a living. Many of us have migrated from the village to the city with families in toe, looking for employment, better living conditions, and a better quality education for their children. The majority of Gandharbas are illiterate. Job discrimination is common - not a single senior level position in the government is held by a Gadharba. We have been involved in Dalit networks and in several programs involving but we are left out by the Dalit organizatons as well. so i want to so this business. to get oppertunity and survive in this expensive Nepal.

lender.name: Sparked
lender.loan_because: We believe that entrepreneurs have the power to change things and to make a difference.

lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others opportunity. These individuals are motivated and dedicated to working hard to create a better life for themselves and their families.
